title: What will the Duchess of Cambridge wear from next season's catwalks?
text:
One of the most enjoyable aspects of fashion month for an editor is trying to imagine which celebrity might eventually wear each runway look. We ask ourselves if Balenciaga’s ballgowns or J-Lo’s palm print dress will end up on the red carpet - and if so, who has the swagger to carry them off? It’s a grown-up game of fashion fantasy-dressing.

And the Duchess of Cambridge is one of our favourite candidates for a turn in the fantasy changing room. She has both the means to shop the runway, and the occasions to demand a high-octane wardrobe, and now that she is working with style consultant and Sunday Telegraph columnist Virginia Chadwyck-Healey, she is more adventurous than ever in her choices....
description: One of the most enjoyable aspects of fashion month for an editor is trying to imagine which celebrity might eventually wear each runway look.
